text:
@realDonaldTrump @GoyaFoods And I LOVE THESE NUMBERS!!
An ABC News-Ipsos poll released on Friday morning showed that 67% of the public disapproves of how Trump is handling the coronavirus pandemic. A look at recent national polling suggests that Trump is somewhere between 8 to 12 points behind Biden!
